text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock Listening to this incompetent twit (@MattHancock), had me holding my head in my hands. Lack of testing/screening at Airports makes a mockery of preventing the spread of #CoronaVirus and protecting people and frontline workers. Exasperated. #COVID19
